ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Armor and Weapon Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: You may wanna try to hit EC Saturday morning and buy a Yak or two. Good place for ya to get to 32 is Lake of Ill Omen. Follow the path along the hillside into
ygData.messageBody:
You may wanna try to hit EC Saturday morning and buy a Yak or two.
Good place for ya to get to 32 is Lake of Ill Omen.
Follow the path along the hillside into the Sarnak fortress, then when it
ends, go up and to the right. There is a plateau there where you can pull
to where the sarnaks don't go.
After you no longer get exp there, either head to Frontier Mountains and
kill giants at the camp there (or anything in that zone actually), or head
to the FV giants and get in a good group there.

-=B=-
45th
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: "Chris Holden" <chris.holden@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 12:40 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Armor and Weapon Advice


> Hello all. I have been playing EQ very sparingly the last few months.
> I was wondering if I could some equipment/weapon advice (or point me
> to a post, etc..) for my bard.
>
> I am on the Rathe, Level 30 almost 31. I should be able to hit 32
> next week. I would like to try and get XP and a chance at upgrading my
> stuff. I don't have a lot of cash either. I am currently in Cazic
> Thule going between the Temple and TR's whereever I can find a group
> (it's fun going from Main Tank, to healer (only healer at one point),
> to crowd control).
>
> If any of you can suggest some upgrades and price ranges I would
> appreciate it.
>
> Currently I have:
>
> Weapons
> Blade of Fiery Lamentations (Dam: 5,Del: 18, Proc: Fiery Fingers)
> Obsidian Shard (Dam: 6, Del: 25, Proc: Obsidian Shard)
> Gnoll Hide Lariat(Dam: 3, Del: 20, Proc: Stun)
> Enameled Black Mace (Dam: 8, Del: 28)
>
> Range Slot
> Runed Bone Fork (Magic/Fire/Cold +10)
>
> Instruments
> Mistmoore Drums
>
> Arms: Lambent Arms (AC 11, +1 CHA, +2 FR, +2 DR, +2 CR, +2 MR, +2 PR)
> Back: Cloak of the Ice Bear (AC 8, +10 HP, +20 CR)
> Bracer #1: Lambent Bracer (AC 9, +4 STR, +1 CHA)
> Bracer #2: Bracer of Scavenging (AC 9, Dex +5, Sta +5)
> Chest: Lambent Breastplate (AC 20, +5 STA, +1 CHA, +25 HP)
> Ear #1: Opalline Earings (AC 2, Cha +5)
> Ear #2: Opalline Earings (AC 2, Cha +5)
> Face: Mask of Deception (AC 4, Magic +7, Cha +13)
> Feet: Lambent boots (AC 11, +1 CHA, +2 CR, +2 DR, +2 FR, +2 MR, +2 PR)
> Fingers #1: Jagged Band(AC 5, Str +3)
> Fingers #2: Jagged Band(AC 5, Str +3)
> Hands: Iksar Scaled Gloves (AC 10, Str +3, Dex +3, HP +10)
> Head: Skull Shaped Barbrute (AC 13, +35 HP, +10 MR)
> Legs: Lambent Greaves (AC 13, +1 CHA, +5 AGI)
> Neck: Cape of Midnight Mist (AC 2, +5 STR, +7 MR)
> Shoulders: Pegasus Feather Cloak (AC 7, Dex + Effect: levitate. Got
> before the Epic Quests. I here there thinking of making it tradeable)
> Waist: Troll Hide Belt (AC , Str +3, Sta +3)
>
> Thanks in advance for any suggestions.
> -Chris
>
